sub_title: Head of the installation service Megabit Service LLC
summary:
HAVE EXPERIENCE:
- personnel management (selection, training, motivation) (subordinate to 20 people) .
- accounting of working hours
- planning and organization of work of the department
- planning the purchase of materials for the department
- making deals and monitoring the fulfillment of contractual obligations
- calculation and preparation of budget documentation
- design , installation, maintenance of Fiber Optic Communication Lines, Structured
Cabling Systems.
- installation, configuration, maintenance of network equipment
- calculation, installation, configuration of video surveillance systems
- installation, configuration of access control systems
- selection of components, assembly, diagnostics, block repair of PC
- installation and configuration of software
 - calculation, installation of PON networks
- calculation, installation of Wi-Fi and Wi-Fi mesh networks based on mikrotik, ubiquiti,
tp-link (Omada) equipment.

PERSONAL QUALITIES:
- discipline, 
- stress tolerance, 
- purposefulness, 
- sociability , 
- responsibility, 
- fast learner, 
- i like to solve non-standard problems.

KNOWLEDGE OF LANGUAGES :
 Ukrainian - native
 Russian - native
 English - elementary level.

ADDITIONAL DETAILS:
 Married, has two children (born in 2010 and 2018 ).
 I have a category B driver's license.
